participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Curious and introspective, often pondering the consequences of his unique abilities.
participant_1.background: since the surgery i've had strange powers. i had to have a transplant. i can move objects with my mind. i was born with my heart outside my body. i am a boy.

participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and nurturing, she loves working with children and is excited about her upcoming marriage.
participant_2.background: i am 24 years old. my favorite singer is taylor swift. i work at a school as a kindergarten teacher. i'm getting married in the spring.

content.text: How are you doing today what do you do?
